member.name: T:Cake.FileHelpers.FileHelperAliases
member.summary: File helper aliases. A set of aliases for Cake Build to help with simple File operations such as Reading, Writing and Replacing text.

member.name: M:Cake.FileHelpers.FileHelperAliases.FileReadText(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Reads all text from a file
member.returns: The file's text.

member.name: M:Cake.FileHelpers.FileHelperAliases.FileReadText(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Reads all text from a file
member.returns: The file's text.
member.param: The encoding to use for the file.

member.name: M:Cake.FileHelpers.FileHelperAliases.FileReadLines(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Reads all lines from a file
member.returns: The file's text lines.

member.summary: Reads all lines from a file

member.param: The encoding to use for the file.

member.name: T:Cake.FileHelpers.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types representing data used for common file operations, such as reading, writing and replacing text.
